content: cool water and wool wash and join for working in the round being careful not to twist sts block to measurements work in k1 p1 slipped ribbing for 2 5 cm pom pom body make a 2 5 7 cm diameter pompom secure pom pom to change to larger ndls hat and tie off inside set up label round 1 k around wrapping yarn twice for each st using sewing thread or yarn provided in kit and a sharp round 2 *sl 4 sts to rh ndl dropping extra wraps place 4 sewing needle sew kelbourne woolens label to brim as sts back onto lh ndl k4tog p4tog k4tog p4tog into 4 sts shown repeat from * around work rnds 1 4 of anemone stitch twice then rnds 1 2 once more decrease for crown round 1 * k wrapping yarn twice for each st 7 times k2tog wrapping yarn twice repeat from * around 64 sts round 2 *sl 4 sts to rh ndl dropping extra wraps place 4 sts back onto lh ndl k4tog p4tog k4tog p4tog into 4 sts repeat from * around round 3 * k wrapping yarn twice for each st 6 times k2tog wrapping yarn twice repeat from * around 56 sts round 4 *sl 4 sts to rh ndl dropping extra wraps place 4 sts back onto lh ndl k4tog p4tog k4tog p4tog into 4 sts repeat from * around round 5 * k wrapping yarn twice for each st 5 times k2tog wrapping yarn twice repeat from * around 48 sts round 6 *sl 4 sts to rh ndl dropping extra wraps place 4 sts back onto lh ndl k4tog p4tog k4tog p4tog into 4 sts repeat from * around round 7 * k wrapping yarn twice for each st k2tog wrapping yarn twice repeat from * around 32 sts round 8 *sl 4 sts to rh ndl dropping extra wraps place 4 sts back onto lh ndl k4tog p4tog k4tog p4tog into 4 sts repeat from * around round 9 *k2tog repeat from * around 16 sts round 10 *k2tog repeat from * around 8 sts year of hats 12 more designs from kelbourne woolens ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights
